channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2023100714
item.description:
Report X-2023100714

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-03
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-202310074-X RAYED SHIPMENT AND SAW AN OUTINE THAT I THOUGHT MAY BE A KEROSINE CAN. PERFORMED A PHYSICAL SEARCH AND FOUND NAIL POLISH, NAIL POLISH REMOVER, CLEANSING SOLUTION AND LIGHTERS. X-2023100715 -X RAYED SHIPMENT AND SAW AN OUTINE THAT I THOUGHT MAY BE A KEROSINE CAN. PERFORMED A PHYSICAL SEARCH AND FOUND NAIL POLISH, NAIL POLISH REMOVER, CLEANSING SOLUTION AND LIGHTERS. X-2023100716-X RAYED SHIPMENT AND SAW AN OUTINE THAT I THOUGHT MAY BE A KEROSINE CAN. PERFORMED A PHYSICAL SEARCH AND FOUND NAIL POLISH, NAIL POLISH REMOVER, CLEANSING SOLUTION AND LIGHTERS. X-2023100717-X RAYED SHIPMENT AND SAW AN OUTINE THAT I THOUGHT MAY BE A KEROSINE CAN. PERFORMED A PHYSICAL SEARCH AND FOUND NAIL POLISH, NAIL POLISH REMOVER, CLEANSING SOLUTION AND LIGHTERS.

item.title: Report X-2023100425
item.description:
Report X-2023100425

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-14T18:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-11
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: While screening bags for an awb found some hazardous items. 1 Bear spray, 1 Flex Seal,1 Off bug spray, 1 dry shampoo all which are highly flammable, there was also a power bank and a lighter. This customer was asked by the receiving agent if they did have any hazardous items to report but the customer said no.

This customer was asked by the receiving agent if they did have any hazardous items to report but the customer said no.
